hero.title: About
hero.subtitle: Building the cognitive layer for modern enterprises. We transform businesses with autonomous agents, voice AI, and custom software architectures.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: At Sortask, we believe that artificial intelligence should augment human capability, not replace it. Our mission is to build intelligent systems that empower businesses to operate more efficiently, make better decisions, and scale without limits.
mission.p2: Based in Graz, Austria, we operate globally, bringing cutting-edge AI solutions to enterprises worldwide. We specialize in creating autonomous agents, voice AI systems, and custom software architectures that transform how businesses work.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading provider of AI-powered automation solutions, enabling every enterprise to harness the power of artificial intelligence seamlessly and effectively.

speed.title: Speed & Efficiency
speed.description: We deliver fast, efficient AI solutions that integrate seamlessly into your workflow, reducing operational overhead.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: Every solution is built with precision and care, ensuring reliability and performance that exceeds expectations.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear communication, honest pricing, and transparent processes. No hidden fees, no surprises.

quickCall.title: Quick Call

hero.title: Frequently Asked
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our AI solutions.

items.question: How long does it take to implement an AI solution?
items.answer: Implementation time varies based on complexity. Simple automation workflows can be deployed in 2-4 weeks, while comprehensive AI agent systems typically take 6-12 weeks. We provide detailed timelines during our initial consultation.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing support and maintenance?
items.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive support packages including monitoring, updates, and maintenance. Our Enterprise plan includes 24/7 monitoring and priority support to ensure your AI solutions run smoothly.

items.question: Can AI agents integrate with our existing systems?
items.answer: Absolutely. Our AI agents are designed to integrate seamlessly with popular business tools and APIs. We can build custom integrations for proprietary systems as well.

items.question: How secure is the data processed by your AI solutions?
items.answer: Security is our top priority. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We comply with GDPR and other data protection regulations. We can also deploy solutions on-premises if required.

items.question: What kind of ROI can we expect?
items.answer: Our clients typically see 5-10x ROI within the first year. This comes from reduced operational costs, increased efficiency, and improved customer satisfaction. We provide detailed ROI projections during the consultation phase.

items.question: Do you offer training for our team?
items.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive training and documentation to ensure your team can effectively use and manage the AI solutions. Training is included in our Enterprise plan.

cta.title: Still Have Questions?
cta.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Get in touch with our team.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: This Cookie Policy explains how Sortask GmbH ("we", "us", or "our") uses cookies and similar technologies on our website (sortask.com) to recognize you when you visit our website.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.text: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to the website owners.

whyWeUse.title: Why We Use Cookies
whyWeUse.text: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. Cookies help us:
items: Understand how you use our website

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.text: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility.

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.text: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.text: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make and provide enhanced features and personalization.

managing.title: Managing Cookies
managing.text: You can control and manage cookies in various ways. Most browsers allow you to refuse or accept cookies. You can also delete cookies that have already been set. Please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us:
